name: Propellers
description:
Fight UFOs and gather treasure flying a small plane

Controls:

Player1: Arrows to move, dot (.) to shoot and line (-) to drop bombs

Player 2: WAD to move, 1 to shoot and 2 to drop bombs

This game is a work in progress.
Some of the known issues:

The planes have no propellers!
Controls cannot be changed, sorry AZERTY people!
UFOs can't be harmed with bombs.
